newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - PageNet rating lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PageNet rating lowered.

text.p: -- Market sources said Wessels, Arnold & Henderson lowered its rating of Paging Network Inc to a hold from a buy.
-- PageNet shares fell 1-3/8 to 11 in heavy midday trading on Nasdaq.

-- Sources said Wessels was concerned a recent discount in the handset price for the company's newest product, VoiceNow, and the additional number of prepackaged messages available on VoiceNow, may suggest trouble with the company's subscriber growth rate.
-- Wessels, based in Minneapolis, declined to comment.
